job description:
Job Requisition Number: 20171115E

Job Title: Mid-Level Data Analyst

Salary Range or Maximum: Negotiable

Work Location: Panama City, FL Relocation Assistance: None

Employment Type: Full-Time

Security Clearance: SECRET

Posted Date: 15 November 2017 Closing Date: Continuous

Mandatory Skill Requirements (must have):

Must have strong analytical skills to work with large amounts of data; excellent written and oral communication skills present complex ideas; critical thinking to reach conclusions based on findings; strong attention to detail; math and statistical skills to support conclusions. Must possess strong Microsoft Office skills.

Desired Skill Requirements:

Working knowledge of Naval Surface Warfare Center (NSWC) Panama City Division Adaptive Persistent Awareness Systems (APAS) or similar specific hardware and software applications.

Job Duties:

Analyze data, prepare analytical reports, create databases, devise methods for identifying data patterns and trends in available information sources. Investigate and evaluate commercial practices, COTS or GOTS products, and new emerging technologies, such as Internet Protocol version 6 (IPv6) to identify potential best practices for NSWC PCD approval. Assist Team Leads with support of system design reviews for systems incorporating any of these technologies or having any security requirements; evaluation of system integration strategies with respect to security impacts; and recommendation of design approaches to address system vulnerabilities.

Education/Equivalent:

Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or closely related field preferred.

Travel Required:

None

Comments:

Apply for position online at http://industechnology.applicantpro.com/jobs/.
